channel.title: Minecraft Hotkeys - Help Please?
channel.description:
Wasn't sure where I should post this to be honest, but this seemed like the most fitting section for it in my eyes. Basically, I'd just like to know how I could enable hot keys for minecraft and other games such as Runescape and things like that, on my old windows 7 computer they worked fine but on my new windows 7 (lap top) I'm not sure how to toggle them for games as of right now they do things like control the brightness of my screen or volume of my computer and honestly I don't need any of that.
I've searched google several times but no luck there, if you could help it'd be greatly appreciated. Thanks in advance, Acorn_

item.title: Minecraft Hotkeys - Help Please?
item.dc:creator: @Acorn1 Acorn_
item.description:
@Acorn1 wrote:

Ahh, shame.
Thanks for the answer though.

Read full topic

item.title: Minecraft Hotkeys - Help Please?
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

It was probably a setting your old laptop had from the factory or a 3rd party program. Doesnt come as a feature in win7.

Read full topic
